Text.Page:
Sashike died today. I don't quite know how to write this, or even if I can, but I'll try.

The argons separated usâ€”a tactical move we weren't ready for. They took her down quickly, and then swarmed over her body like giant insects.

I killed as many as I could. They didn't seem to notice. Finally they pulled apart, each with a piece of her, and ran away, leaving me behind.

Even more curious, the argons are building extractors in Granarkus, but why?Put message away.
